agilermi

Class RmiRegistry.Builder

  • java.lang.Object
    • agilermi.RmiRegistry.Builder
  • Enclosing class:
    RmiRegistry

    public static class RmiRegistry.Builder
extends java.lang.Object
    Builder for RmiRegistry. A new instance of this class can be returned by the RmiRegistry.builder() static method. A new instance of this class wraps all the defaults for RmiRegistry and allows to modify them. When the configuration has been terminated, a new RmiRegistry instance can be obtained by the build() method. defaults:
    • connection listener enabled: false
    • connection listener port: 0 (a random port)
    • connection listener daemon: true
    • ServerSocketFactory: null (that is ServerSocketFactory.getDefault())
    • SocketFactory: null (that is SocketFactory.getDefault())
    • FilterFactory: null
    • Authenticator: null
    • authentication Identifier: null (that is guest identifier)
    • authentication pass-phrase: null (that is guest pass-phrase)
    Author:
    Salvatore Giampa'

      Builds the RmiRegistry.

      Set the data used to authenticate new connection from this registry on the remote machines.

      Sets the FilterFactory instance to use in the registry to build.

      • enableListener

        public RmiRegistry.Builder enableListener(int port,
                                          boolean isDaemon)
        Enable the connection listener on the registry to build.
        Parameters:
        port - the port to listen on
        isDaemon - the daemon flag of the listener thread. See Thread.setDaemon(boolean) for more details.
        Returns:
        this builder

      • disableListener

        public RmiRegistry.Builder disableListener()
        Disable the connection listener on the registry to build. This method is useful when the same instance of the builder is used to build more than one registry and the enableListener(int, boolean) method was called.
        Returns:
        this builder
